name: Airman X
summary:
Reporting!
「Airman X」 is a casual game that is a challenge against the reaction speeds of its players, in which they can take control of the paratrooper and help him thread his way among obstacles.And you will successfully complete your mission after the paratrooper’s safe landing.
Never forget to collect the medals you win at each game level. For later on you can unlock the endless mode and challenge the extreme mission.
